intro: Zeuxine argentea, commonly known as silverroot, is a herbaceous perennial plant native to the mountainous regions of Central Asia. Zeuxine argentea thrives in moist, well-drained soils and prefers partial to full shade. Its ornamental value makes it a sought-after addition to gardens, though it requires careful cultivation to prevent it from becoming invasive.
